message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000, which represents a significant potential profit for you. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
